presidentReport: Welcome to the Demo Radio Club's January meeting. We're excited to start the new year with great energy and participation.
Our club continues to thrive with new members and exciting projects ahead.
vicePresidentReport: Equipment upgrades are moving forward. We've narrowed down vendor options and will make a final decision soon.
Planning educational sessions for the coming months. Input from members is always welcome.

report: All repeater systems are functioning well. Recent maintenance has improved reliability.
Planning equipment upgrades for better coverage in the southern areas of our coverage zone.
Spring licensing class preparations are underway. We expect strong enrollment.
Developing mentorship program to help new hams get on the air successfully.

oldBusiness: Field Day 2025 site selection - committee to report next month
Repeater upgrade funding approved - work to begin in February
Club website redesign - new site launched successfully
newBusiness: Proposal to sponsor local high school STEM club - approved
Summer picnic planning - June 20th tentative date
Request for club participation in emergency communications drill
announcements: Next VE session: February 5th at 10:00 AM
State convention registration now open - early bird discount until Feb 1st
Monthly breakfast: Every Saturday at 8:00 AM at Joe's Diner
Next board meeting: February 19th at 7:00 PM
